definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Consider a family of parallel lines that cut the conic .
sentences.chinese: 設有一組平行線與圓錐曲線相交。

sentences.english: Conics is a difficult section in the Analytic Geometry for senior high school students.
sentences.chinese: 圓錐曲線是高中生解析幾何學習中的一個難點。

sentences.english: Line with the conic question is one of the content of college entrance examination.
sentences.chinese: 直線與圓錐曲線的題型是高考必考內容之一。

sentences.english: With examples, this article attempts to explain the method of polar coordinates and its application in conic .
sentences.chinese: 結合實例，闡述了極座標法在圓錐曲線中的運用。

sentences.english: Apollonius is chiefly noted for his work on conic sections.
sentences.chinese: 亞婆羅尼主要地是以他對於圓錐曲線的研究而聞名的。
